Type.BattleDialog: Things got complicated. Shall we start unraveling them?
Strange things have been happening these days… It’s such a hassle.
Let’s see here… Won’t there be any problems?
That was enough intel. Shall we head back?
Oh dear… I don’t think you’ll meet the conditions, unfortunately.
This is it for me, huh…
This is a particularly troublesome case we’ve gotten into…
It’s okay for now. Keep your focus.
I’ve got to save myself first and foremost.
Sorry~ It’s just how our work goes all the time.
I can collect some other types of info as well… This isn’t so bad.
Haha. I may have gotten old, but I’m not a goner yet…
This took a bothersome turn…
Our work tends to be the same…
I suppose there won’t be any big problems?
Irina, ma’am? I think we ought to be careful.
That’s right… I heard it was recently exalted to a Star of the City.
I’ve recorded everything that needs to be. Time to return.
This was one bizarre place… I wonder if it’s a Singularity or something?
We’ve been getting lots of nutty cases lately…
At least that’s one case done.
What… is the purpose of this place? I don’t…
Always thought I was… ready to go through this…
I warned you that this request might pose too much…
Sod it… Take care of yourselves…
I’m sick of this business…
…We definitely needed backup.
I guess our client wasn’t lying after all.
…This is rather serious, isn’t it?
Maybe we should go back for now and reorganize…
I don’t think we’ll resolve this on our own.
Let’s tidy up the rest posthaste.
It seems we’re almost done.
I can’t say it was a pushover.
There’s much to note about this…
Wavering even for a second is going to be a death sentence.
